name: LumberJack Revision
overview: Move Lumberjack left and right of the tree to chop wood making sure to avoid the deadly branches. The game is also over when the timer expires. -High heels: Slows down energy loss, -Panties: Recharges energy -Bra: Gives 25 points -Collect 3 different items to turn on Switch Mode. Switching sides gives 10 points. -Beer bottle: Shakes your screen thus slowing you down a bit while you chop for a while. Ends switch Switch Mode. In the options menu, if you chose Hard difficulty, picking up the beer bottle will reverse your controls for a while.
